name: Engineered Software
overview:
Engineered Software, Inc. is a privately held software design and service company. The company creates modeling software and training products used by engineers for the pump and piping system industry.

Their main products are PIPE-FLO and PUMP-FLO. Engineered Software is also the creator of Flow of Fluids Premium software holding an agreement with Crane Co. to produce market and sell their Technical Paper, TP410.

The company primarily serves customers in architectural, engineering and construction, manufacturing markets through a small network of distributors worldwide. The company works in the aerospace and defense, chemical processing, engineering design and consulting, food and beverage, oil and petrochemical, mining and metals, pharmaceutical, power generation, pulp and paper, waste water collection and treatment and education industries.
